name: fsspreadsheet
description: Spreadsheet creation and manipulation in FSharp

scripts.pretest: npm run clean-test && dotnet fable tests/FsSpreadsheet.Tests -o tests/FsSpreadsheet.Tests/js
scripts.pretestexceljs: npm run clean-testexceljs && dotnet fable tests/FsSpreadsheet.Exceljs.Tests -o tests/FsSpreadsheet.Exceljs.Tests/js
scripts.pretestjs: npm run clean-testjs && dotnet fable src/FsSpreadsheet.Exceljs -o tests/JS/FsSpreadsheet.Exceljs --extension .fs.js
